data.text: @MonkeyStyle67 Hi Andres, I understand how inconvenient it is to have a missing baggage. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and can be reached here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Dan

@_MarcGielen_ Hi Marc, I understand how having your flight changed can affect your travel plans. We never like having to change flight times however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks - Norine

@HorrorFetishArt @HorrorFetishArt Hi there, sorry to hear that you're unable to reach the team immediately. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this and see how we can help. Thanks - Jay

@lesposen Hey @lesposen, There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on to CM Trish and Capt Dave, they’ll be stoked to hear it. - Dan
@matt_koch Hey Matthew, There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on to our team! - Dan

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @P00man1 Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Yes - from Tuesday 19 July 2022, in line with Australian Federal Government requirements, we'll no longer require passengers on international flights entering Australia operated by Jetstar to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19. 1/2

@DavidHagger Hi David, sorry to hear about this. Carry-on and checked baggage is weighed separately, so if you go over your baggage weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. If you wish to discuss a specific booking, you can send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi
